items.typeLine: Alchemist's Ruby Flask of the Order
craftedMods: Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Gloom Palm
enchantMods: Trigger Commandment of Force on Hit
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 217 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2700 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 30% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Bated Breath
flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

items.name: Victario's Influence
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 45% increased Reservation Efficiency
29% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
14% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: The Eternal Struggle
implicitMods: While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 25% increased Armour
16% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
explicitMods: Critical Strikes inflict Malignant Madness if The Eater of Worlds is dominant
Kill Enemies that have 15% or lower Life on Hit if The Searing Exarch is dominant
flavourText: Simply the way it must be, so that existence may be.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. If dual wielding attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one hit. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: When Dual Wielding, Deals 75% Damage from each Weapon combined
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Soul Ripper
explicitMods: Loses all Charges when you enter a new area

- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

properties.name: Lightning, Attack, AoE, Duration, Melee, Strike, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a melee attack, and causes lightning to strike a targeted location or nearby enemy, dealing damage in an area. Each target can only be hit once by this skill. Hitting an enemy grants an aura, giving you and your allies additional lightning damage for a duration. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Aura grants 12 to 220 added Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
